entries.description: CodeWhisperer suggestions may be trimmed under certain criteria
Amazon Q CodeTransform: open summary.md automatically when job finishes
CodeWhisperer not handling extra closing symbols (parenthesis, brackets, quotes) when user typeahead exists
Cloud9: error when expanding S3 folder
SAM local debugging: Toolkit showed SamLaunchRequestError for `AWS::Lambda::Function` template resource
Amazon Q CodeTransform: use Maven wrapper (if present) to copy dependencies if Maven not installed
SAM lambda debugging: SAM output and other logs are now presented with VSCode's log highlighting
